channel.title: Maccy
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Allow showing currently copied item next to the menu bar icon
  • Allow keeping the previous application focus on the popup
  • Throttle search input so that when typing fast it doesn't update results until typing is finished
  • Support Norwegian localization
  • Update icon to match Big Sur
  • Fix an issue when images wouldn't be pasted if formatting is cleared by default
  • Fix an issue with disappearing pins
